article_title: Devastating setback for evacuated Gaza teen after surgery
sentence: Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October  2023,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  some  251  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Devastating setback for evacuated Gaza teen after surgery
sentence: The  Israeli  military  offensive  that  followed  has  killed  more  than  42,000  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Devastating setback for evacuated Gaza teen after surgery
sentence: The  bombardments  have  closed  hospitals,  killed  doctors,  and  overwhelmed  remaining  facilities  with  casualties.
